name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The unified attribute for the Rectangle Button

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: hoverable
content.description:
whether the button will respond to mouse hover events
default: true

content.name: selectable
content.description:
whether the button will be selectable
default: true

content.name: pressable
content.description:
whether the button will be pressable
default: true

content.name: text_left
content.description:
text which will be presented on the left side of the button. If no value is provided, no text will be shown
default: -none-

content.name: text_centre
content.description:
text which will be presented in the centre of the button. If no value is provided, no text will be shown
default: -none-

content.name: text_right
content.description:
text which will be presented on the right side of the button. If no value is provided, no text will be shown
default: -none-

content.name: text_horizontal_padding
content.description: padding placed to the left of the "text_left" text, and to the right of the "text_right" text

content.name: style__off
style__up
style__press
style__select
style__select_press
style__glow
style__glow_press
style__glow_select
style__glow_select_press
style__hover
style__hover_press
style__hover_select
style__hover_select_press
style__hover_glow
style__hover_glow_press
style__hover_glow_select
style__hover_glow_select_press
